poem:
"A Dance of Allegiances"

MPs, like leaves, turn their colours 
evoked by the distinct seasons of politics.
Embodying the spirit of Nottinghamshire,
flitting from Labour to Tory,
clinging to the promise of change.
Defection, described with raised brows, 
becomes the independent waltz.
Disequilibrium in the balance of power,
so surprising yet as natural
as the ebb and flow of the northern tide.
